Properties.Name: Prominent warning
Properties.Description: If Y, this section is a prominent warning, such as an FDA "boxed warning"

Properties.Name: Section LOINC code
Properties.Description: If available, a LOINC code describing the contents of the section.

Properties.Name: Section name
Properties.Description: Name of the label section, such as Indications, Contraindications, etc.

Properties.Name: Highlight text
Properties.Description: Human-readable highlight text for the label section, if available.

Properties.Name: Section URI
Properties.Description: Direct link to the section in an online version of the drug label
